revised_title: Spectra of Ignited Gases and Vapours: A Study on Different Spectra of Elementary Gaseous Substances
tldr: The authors investigate the spectra of ignited gases and vapors, focusing on the differences in spectra of the same elementary gaseous substances. They describe various methods for obtaining spectra, including using electric currents and flame, and discuss the importance of the density of the gas in the spectral analysis.
